title: Test screeings are a go
body:
Last night's test screening went pretty well, so here's hoping we can pull another miracle out our ass tonight! Just kidding. The miracle will actually come out of our nose(s). For those of you who came last night: thanks! And for those coming tonight: early thanks! I'll post pictures sometime over the weekend (most likely Sunday), but until then please feel free to unburden yourself on this timely topic from the Moxie forum.

Wish us luck!
author: Dan

comments.author: Caleb
comments.body:
I am so excited for tonight! Good luck!

Also good luck to getting Mark Zupan to stop by the Moxie. That would be awesome.

comments.author: brian of moore
comments.body:
good luck
but dont break any legs.. someone might sue

comments.author: Caleb
comments.body:
As Lucien might put it...

Dan & Nicole, put on a great show!
Dan & Nicole, way to go!
Dan & Nicole, ace in the hole!
Dan & Nicole, ain't just so-so!
Dan & Nicole, make me say whoa!
Dan & Nicole, better than UFOs!
Dan & Nicole, quid pro quo...

err...i think i got carried away...

comments.author: Jamie
comments.body: Wow guys, I can't beleive its already time to open.  We are planning a trip to Springfield on Oct 8 so we will be able to see a movie, and you guys hopefully!

comments.author: Rick
comments.body: Thank you for letting me be part of opening night.I enjoyed myself and must say that you two where soooo cool.

comments.author: Maddy
comments.body:
I am so damn jealous... I followed your work forever and then I had to move a month before you opened...

But, congrats on getting it done. I am way, way, way impressed!
